title: GDG DevFest Ahmedabad 2017
description: GDG DevFest Ahmedabad brings together the world class experts in Android and Web technologies to Gujarat for 1 day of sessions, workshops and showcases. Described by many as 'Google I/O of Ahmedabad', our team creates DevFest to be the best place for experience sharing in a phenomenal atmosphere.
keywords: event, gdg, gde, devfest, google, programming, android, chrome, polymer, developers, web, cloud, androiddev
motto: The biggest Google tech conference in Ahmedabad. All about Android and Web.
subscribeNote: No spam, only the latest news and updates!
ticketsDetails: To ensure quality participation, the submitted entries are filtered based on the details filled in the registration form. Only those participants who receive confirmation email from us will be eligible to attend the event.
socialMotto: Add to circles, like, follow or connect with us on
clickToViewPhotos: Click here to view more photos
locationTitle: Gujarat University Convention and Exhibition Centre
locationDescription: It is a purpose-built and state-of-the-art convention facility, located in the heart of urban Ahmedabad.
locationAddress: 132 Ring Road,Near Helmet Circle,Opp Mayflower Hospital
aboutOrganizers: GDG Ahmedabad with support of 10 GDGs from all around Gujarat is proud organizer of DevFest Ahmedabad
aboutGdg: Google Developers Group (GDG) - is open and volunteer geek community who create exciting projects and share experience about Google technologies with a passion
teamPageText:
Google is known all around the world. Everyone is 'googling', checking on 'maps' and communicating in 'gmail'. For simple users, they are services that just works, but not for us. Developers see much more: APIs, scalability issues, complex technology stacks. And that is what GDG is about.

[Google Developers Group (GDG) Ahmedabad](http://www.meetup.com/GDG-Ahmedabad/) - is open and volunteer geek community who create exciting projects and share experience about Google technologies with a passion.

Our goal is to organize space to connect the best industry experts with Indian audience to boost development of IT.
speakersoon: Other speakers will be announced soon.
schedulesoon: We declare schedule very soon. Stay tuned with us!
